snippet.title: Raiders of Valhalla | Official Demo Trailer
snippet.description:
#afilgames #raidersofvalhalla

Raiders of Valhalla New Trailer 
Demo Available on Steam! 🎉

Lead a fearless horde of Viking dwarves, strengthen them with legendary equipment, conquer unknown lands, and witness the colossal destruction they leave behind. 
How far will you be able to take your warriors? 🛡️

Game Features:
🗡️Army Management
🗡️Synergy Combinations
🗡️Tactical Challenges 
🗡️Over 20 Relics and 30 Skills 
🗡️Item Enhancement

⚔️The journey to Valhalla begins now!⚔️

Play the demo now! 👇👇👇
⚔️https://store.steampowered.com/app/2635510/Raiders_of_Valhalla__Prologue/

Wishlist the MAIN game!
⚔️https://store.steampowered.com/app/2298620/Raiders_of_Valhalla/

🎮 Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/AfilGames
🕹️ Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/AfilGames
⚔️ Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/afilgames/
👊 Follow us on TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@afilgames
